Name: Simple Dot
About the game: Simple Dot is a minimalistic puzzle game, in which problems are solved with lines of various physical properties and the given surroundings. Features: 5 different types of lines to solve problems with, various environment mechanics 70+ diverse levels, multiple ways of solving each problem, an amazing soundtrack created by Dawid Domagała, steam achievements. global rankings (optional – so no preasure), Rules: Objective: guide the balls from one bucket to the other. Your tools: 5 lines with various physical properties. Support: delete unneeded lines, repeat levels as many times you want e.g. once for achievements (stars) and once for points. Rewards: unlock Steam achievements and climb-up the global ranking with the points you gain! Simple Dot is a passion project. Created in my spare time, responsible for sleepless nights, and - in the end - dedicated to my two newborns that are the newest addition to my family.
